org.svvrl.goal.core.layout

Class Movement

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.layout.Movement

  • public class Movement
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a movement of a single node.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Movement(Node n, double dx, double dy)
      Constructor with a node to be moved, a distance of horizontal movement, and a distance of vertical movement.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Applies the movement to the node.
      Node getNode()
      Returns the node of this movement.
      double getXMovement()
      Returns the distance of the horizontal movement.
      double getYMovement()
      Returns the distance of the vertical movement.
